subject: sharing setup across tests => design problem
msgSnippet: Kent: are you saying the design problem is typically with the tests, the unit under test, or both? ... design ... time
messageBody:
Kent: are you saying the design problem is typically with the tests,
the unit under test, or both?

--- In junit@y..., kentbeck@c... wrote:
> When I feel like sharing setup between tests, I usually have a
design
> problem that deserves attention. If I give in and write the one-
time
> setup, I miss the chance to improve my design.
>
> Kent
